jetpack-related-posts.title: Higher National Diploma In Business (HND In Business)
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Message from the Course-Coordinator: Welcome to HND in Business, THE EDEXCEL PATHWAY TO BBA, offered by the Department of Business, United College of Aviation, Science and Management, Uttara, Dhaka. There are very few colleges in Bangladesh like UCASM who runs an International BBA program under BTEC EDEXCEL, UK. EDEXCEL, a…
